MERCER INTERNATIONAL INC. SUSTAINABILITY REPORT 2021A cross-functional team from Mercer’s 
leadership conducted an extensive materiality 
review to identify the key stakeholders and 
to identify and prioritize sustainability topics 
in 202 1. The analysis is carried out annually. 
Information sources representing stakeholder 
views were analyzed to assess the materiality 
of these sustainability topics. These sources 
included investor discussions, employee 
engagement surveys, customer interviews, MERCER’S MATERIALITY

local community engagement. The different
